name: Trial (14 days)
membership_benefits: Can read all the articles in full.
Can see the details of the profile and activities of all the legal advisors, so, you can compare them to find the right advisor.

name: Classic
membership_benefits: Get access to the practitioners' crowd (read-only).
Can read (cannot create new) any post and comment on any number of the articles on the general user's blog.
Will carry a special badge as your 'Student' for identification.
No hidden fee to the IMMILINK platform except the membership fee.

name: Premium
membership_benefits: Can read all the articles in full.
Can see the details of the profile and activities of all the legal advisors, so you can compare them to find the right advisor.

Can submit your detailed profile for the initial consultation. It’s not just a resume, rather it’s almost all the corners your advisor needs to know about you to prescribe your possible pathway(s) to Canada.
Your profile will be shared in the pool of our legal advisors; they may reach out to you if they are interested in advising in your case.
